Basic Plan
Most Popular

1 fashion designer, 5 days/month
  • Access to essential design services
  • Custom clothing tags & basic logos
  • Up to 10 product visuals (e.g. t-shirts, accessories)
  • Chat support via Slack or Teams
  • Cancel anytime – no contract
£999 / month

Pro Retail Plan
Best Value

Full creative team, 5 days/month
  • Everything in Basic Plan
  • Up to 100 branded assets (lookbooks, banners, etc.)
  • Advanced sales & style trend reports
  • Up to 30 high-quality clothing mockups or renders
  • 120GB storage for design assets & lookbooks
£2999 / month

Frequently Asked Questions

How secure is my fashion brand data?
Your designs and brand files are protected with industry-standard AES-256 encryption. We use secure cloud storage and conduct regular security updates to keep your clothing line’s assets safe.
Do you offer a free trial for fashion design services?
Yes! Try our platform free for 14 days—no credit card required. You’ll get access to core features like logo creation, garment mockups, and collection mood boards.
Can your design tools work with other fashion platforms?
Absolutely. Our tools integrate with Figma, Adobe Creative Cloud, Shopify, Webflow, and other platforms commonly used by clothing brands and e-commerce stores.
What kind of support do you offer for clothing design projects?
We offer 24/7 support via chat and email, plus a help center packed with fashion-specific guides, style template tutorials, and brand-building resources.
Can I use your tools offline or without the cloud?
Our tools are built for online collaboration, but you can download your designs in popular formats like SVG for logos, PNG for apparel visuals, or OBJ for 3D clothing models.

Sign up for our newsletter

We have a deep commitment to keeping your data safe. We will never sell your data and will send no more than two emails a month.
